items.sentence: There is a really good restaurant just off the beach that I think you\'d enjoy.
Tom can\'t stand the hot and muggy summers here, so he heads for the mountains.
Tom couldn\'t completely rule out the possibility that Mary had killed herself.
Tom was the driver of the car that crashed into the supermarket on Park Street.
When my uncle left for America, many people came to see him off at the airport.
Tom was a pretty good French teacher and I learned a lot from him very quickly.
Tom\'s mother used to wash his clothes for him, but now he washes them himself.
We\'ll be broke soon if we don\'t stop spending money on things we don\'t need.
Tom couldn\'t completely rule out the possibility that what Mary said was true.
Tom decided that it wasn\'t necessary to deal with that problem this afternoon.
Tom did the best he could, but he wasn\'t able to get a higher grade than Mary.
Tom didn\'t seem surprised when he heard that Mary and John had gotten married.
Tom should\'ve listened to you and bought that painting when he had the chance.
Tom stopped knocking on the door as soon as he realized that Mary wasn\'t home.
Tom thinks Mary should apologize to John for not doing what she said she\'d do.
Tom told the men sitting around the table that he\'d never played poker before.
Tom doesn\'t think it\'ll rain, but he plans to carry an umbrella just in case.
I know you well enough to know that you didn\'t really want to go out with Tom.
Tom told me that he could see no reason why he shouldn\'t accept Mary\'s offer.
I realize the effort you have put into this project and I really appreciate it.
